5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“No one should prepare a mount (travel) to visit any mosque except three: the Sacred Mosque, this mosque of mine, and Aqsa Mosque.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ بَيْتِ الْمَقْدِسِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning praying in the Mosque of Baitil-Maqdis (Jerusalem)
